name: Trump Cash! Idle Clicker Billionaire
description:
He's here!

Help make the big bucks with this awesome idle tapper game! Hire staff to do your tapping, open businesses, launch your own Airport, own a bank and even run the country, if you can make enough money anything is possible!

Features:

Sweeeeet graphics and animations
Making money never felt so good!
A game for all the family!
3882c9cb9f
